p:
Finally, molecular docking studies have been performed for the most active compounds into the active sites of two enzymes: flavoenzyme Decaprenylphosphoryl- β-D-Ribose 2′-Epimerase (DprE1) and enoyl-acyl carrier protein reductase (InhA) being critical enzymes in the metabolism and synthesis of M. tuberculosis cell wall
30
,
31 to explore the possible mechanism of action of the new hybrids.
